attributes.action: Stop Macclesfield council homing  immigrants in Macclesfield 50 family's
attributes.additional_details: We don't want more crime / unlawful sexual acts / etc coming into our area !
attributes.background: Macclesfield council are trying to home 50 family's in the town . A large number of people who live in the borough don't want this !!!

rejection.details:
This is a decision for your local council. You can find out how to petition the council here:

http://www.cheshireeast.gov.uk/council_and_democracy/voting_and_elections/petitions/petition_scheme.aspx
